original_title: Fates Warning: A Pleasant Shade of Gray – Live in Europe
overview: A Pleasant Shade of Gray is a concept album by the progressive metal group Fates Warning. It contains one song divided into twelve parts and is noted for its darker mood and more progressive style. A Pleasant Shade Of Gray live in Europe is a restored and re-edited version of the band's 1998 VHS release.
title: Fates Warning: A Pleasant Shade of Gray – Live in Europe
